languages.text: "Суровый вердикт, но теперь ваши подданные едва ли осмелятся доводить дело до открытых столкновений — в случаях, аналогичных этому, конечно".
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
languages.original_text: "Суровый вердикт, но теперь ваши подданные едва ли осмелятся доводить ло до открытых столкновений — в случаях, аналогичных этому, конечно".

traits.locale_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."
"A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

languages.text: "Ein hartes Urteil, aber von nun an werden Eure Untertanen keine offenen Auseinandersetzungen mehr führen ... in vergleichbaren Fällen, versteht sich.
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Ein hartes Urteil, aber von nun an werden Eure Untertanen keine offenen Auseinandersetzungen mehr führen ... in vergleichbaren Fällen, versteht sich.

languages.text: « Un verdict sévère, certes, mais dorénavant, vos sujets éviteront d'envenimer les choses au point de déclencher une guerre ouverte... du moins dans les cas similaires à celui qui nous intéresse. »
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: « Un verdict sévère, certes, mais dorénavant, vos sujets éviteront d'envenimer les choses au point de déclencher une guerre ouverte... du moins dans les cas similaires à celui qui nous intéresse. »

languages.text: “这是个严厉的判决，不过从此时此刻起，您的臣民应该再也不敢将矛盾升级到公开冲突的地步。当然，我指的是类似于这个案件的情况。”
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: “这是个严厉的判决，不过从此时此刻起，您的臣民应该再也不敢将矛盾升级到公开冲突的地步。当然，我指的是类似于这个案件的情况。”

languages.text: «Un veredicto duro, pero, a partir de ahora, sus súbditos no osarán iniciar un enfrentamiento abierto... en casos similares a este, por supuesto».
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: «Un veredicto duro, pero, a partir de ahora, sus súbditos no osarán iniciar un enfrentamiento abierto... en casos similares a este, por supuesto».

languages.text: 「厳しい判決ですが、今後はあなたの臣民たちも、この件のような状況で公然たる衝突にまで発展させることは、ほとんどできなくなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: 「厳しい判決ですが、今後はあなたの臣民たちも、この件のような状況で公然たる衝突にまで発展させることは、ほとんどできなくなるでしょう」

languages.text: "Sert bir hüküm ama bundan böyle tebaanız, aralarındaki anlaşmazlıkları açık çatışmalar noktasına getirmeye cüret edemeyecektir... Elbette bu tarz meselelerde."
languages.original_text: "A harsh verdict, but from now on your subjects will hardly dare escalate situations to the point of open clashes — in cases similar to this one, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Sert bir hüküm ama bundan böyle tebaanız, aralarındaki anlaşmazlıkları açık çatışmalar noktasına getirmeye cüret edemeyecektir... Elbette bu tarz meselelerde."
